name: Duxton Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As others have said this is a 3 star hotel at 5 star prices. The Rooms are nice and comfortable, but there is no service from staff. But be careful, they also hold $200 on your credit card for "incidentals" but do not release it on checkout, and is not mentioned anywhere. I had to call, got transfered 4 times to be told it takes 5 days to remove it. I expected a LOT more from a 5 star hotel.
reviews.title: $200 Bond

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I stayed for my birthday, deluxe spa room. Everything about the Duxton is beautiful.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are so friendly and helpful and the room was beautiful
reviews.title: Dont book here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Will definately stay again
reviews.title: 5 star prices for 3 star rooms - disappointing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed one night that was more than enough.
reviews.title: Definitely high standard!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Contrary to some of the other reviews I've read we had a great experience with the Duxton. We called quite a few different hotels when looking for accommodation for the night before and night of our wedding. They were the only one's who seemed to understand what was required for a wedding and were incredibly helpful with moving/ carrying bags, switching rooms and the service overall was great.
reviews.title: Wonderful wedding accommodation..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a club room which was very spacious and comfortable, our bedding was good quality and shower pressure was good. Not the most modern decor but comfortable. The complimentary canapes & champagne the night before and breakfast the next morning were brilliant!
reviews.title: pretty nice evening

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The only thing that bothered me was the comfusing remote (couldn't get the tv to work) and the loud water pipes in the shower. Neither of which were a major concern.
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perhaps they gave me particularly good service because it was my wedding but based on this experience I'd definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: No No Dont Go !!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: just thought i'd add to the previous reviews. stayed here for one night to celebrate an anniversary and tookadvantage of the "Make a Difference Package". Stayed in a deluxe room and had full buffet breakfast.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: As said by others the only thing 5 star is the price. Not helpful reception, top price for everything. I stayed in the so called"club room". over $450 per night , may be bigger but not very special. Pool area (very tiny) very tired and rundown. Positive it is very central to everything and the food while expensive is good.
reviews.title: 3 star at 5 star prices

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: I stayed at the Duxton Hotel recently & was shocked at how awful it was!
reviews.title: Worst hotel I have ever stayed at

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I work with an airline so yes, I am staying there for free so shouldn't complain and they probably give airline crew the worst rooms.....but still!
reviews.title: Pleasant, although not 5 star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Duxton is the worst hotel we stay at and this is including some of the awful ones in Africa!!
reviews.title: Worst 5 star hotel ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: The room was shabby to say the least. The TV was the size of a postage stamp, the bed sheets HIDEOUS brown colour and desperately need to be updated & dont get me started on the quality of the room service!
reviews.title: Got more from a lesser star Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service was fine. We used the valet service, greeted as we drove up to the front door and vehicle taken care off - left to haul our luggage to reception and then to our room. Check in was efficient and with minimal fuss, nothing exemplary but certainly nothing bad to say. Being my girlfriends and I first stay at a 5 star hotel we where impressed with the marble foyer and made a quick inquiry about the restaurant before heading to our room.
reviews.title: No WOW Factor but did the job.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Booked a Superior King Room. All have baths, some have spa jets. We didn't special request as we where content with being given what was offered, as per the title definitely no WOW factor but everything was as advertised. Clean room, big hot tub and a view to other city buildings. Woke up with 3 big bites on my leg, whether it was from the bed or maybe being bitten walking around the city who knows.
reviews.title: Pleasant rooms, but very arrogant staff, and you get very little for what you pay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dinner was great. Expensive for us students but my word, haven't eaten such a good meal in all my life.
reviews.title: Do not expect 5* service ... or even 3* service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007
reviews.text: THE GOOD
reviews.title: The other reviews are right. Poor Sevice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled on business
reviews.text: Clean, spacious room with a big hot tub.
reviews.title: Good Central hotel

description: Located in the heart of the City, the Duxton Hotel is the perfect 5 star accommodation venue for travellers staying in Perth. Only a few minutes walk away you will discover Perth's major shopping, entertainment and restaurant centres. With the hotel situated just a short stroll from the Swan River, you can enjoy the rare beauty of nearby central parklands and riverside walkways. The hotel offers FREE WI-FI in all accommodation rooms & public areas.
